## Surprise me Function

This function creates a random selection of three recipes among our cocktail dataset. We will use the sample built-in function.

```{r}
df <- readRDS("drinks.rds")

surprise_me <- function(df, n) {
  # Use sample() to randomly select rows
  random_rows <- df[sample(nrow(df), n), , drop = FALSE]
  # Remove row names
  row.names(random_rows) <- NULL
  return(random_rows)
}

surprise_me(df,3)
```
